faq_item_0_question: How can Zúme Training help me fulfill the Great Commission?
faq_item_0_answer: Zúme Training provides practical tools and training to make disciples of all nations, just as Jesus commanded us in Matthew 28:18-20. We will connect you with a trainer who speaks your language and, when possible, lives in your geographic area. This trainer will contact you to schedule the first session, where you can discuss your current situation and goals. From there, your trainer will guide you through Zúme's practical discipleship tools, provide accountability, answer questions, and help you apply what you're learning in your specific context. All this training is free—our trainers donate their time because they are passionate about helping you grow.
faq_item_1_question: What tools does Zúme Training offer for making disciples?
faq_item_1_answer: Zúme Training provides practical tools like S.O.A.P.S. Bible Study and Spiritual Breathing that help you hear God's voice and fulfill His commands. These tools are designed to integrate into your daily life, making it easier for you to make disciples and multiply faith in your community and beyond.

faq_item_3_question: I don't feel qualified to make disciples. Will Zúme Training really be useful for me?
faq_item_3_answer: Many people feel exactly like you. Not feeling qualified is definitely one of the most common questions we hear. Zúme Training specifically addresses this by providing simple, reproducible practical tools that build your confidence step by step. We will connect you with a trainer who will help you grow at the pace you're ready for. Remember that Jesus promised to be with us "always, even to the end of the age"—you are not alone in this mission.
faq_item_4_question: How can I start making disciples in my local community?
faq_item_4_answer: Zúme Training teaches you to start where you are, with the people you already know. Through tools like the "Way of Galilee" and simple discipleship methods, you will learn to identify people of peace in your community, share your faith naturally, and start discipleship groups that multiply. Your trainer will guide you step by step through this process, adapting strategies to your specific context and helping you overcome common obstacles.
